title: Republican State Committee of Kansas
summary:
This AO was divided into two parts, each dealing with different issues raised by a single requestor.  AO 1978-10 Part A dealt with 

expenditures by a state party committee, and was issued on August 29, 1978.  Part B is a close out letter issued on November 21, 1978, 

because the Commission did not have the four votes necessary to issue a binding advisory opinion.
